lead_paragraph: Derek Stepan's short-handed goal snapped a tie with 2:48 to play and the New York Rangers beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 2-1 on Monday night in Eric Staal's much-anticipated debut.

headline.print_headline: Stepan Lifts Rangers Over Blue Jackets 2-1 in Staal's Debut
headline.main: Stepan Lifts Rangers Over Blue Jackets 2-1 in Staal's Debut

snippet: Derek Stepan's short-handed goal snapped a tie with 2:48 to play and the New York Rangers beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 2-1 on Monday night in Eric Staal's much-anticipated debut....
